divs: sighting detailsnumber of witnesses 5 number of objects 1 object shape sphere object lights \ color \ brightness blue white light object motion \ behavior flew up in the air then was flying on circles like crazy then it disapeared object (angular) size look like a comet distance to object far up in the sky angle of observation north facing south weather conditions cold i was at my in laws in the back yard having a smoked ham with 4 other witnesses when some weird light went up in the sky thought it was fireworks but then it blew up like fireworks small explosion but then it started flying in circles and flying like no airplane no sound totally silent then it flew down and it disappeared. we were intruiged wondering what it was .
